i am an ai language model and i cannot browse or use any online social network platforms, including twitter. however, i can provide you with some general information on protecting your personal information regarding data privacy.

as a german citizen, you have the right to control how your personal information is collected, used and shared by businesses. you also have the right to access, correct or delete your personal data that has been processed. the general data protection regulation (gdpr) provides guidelines for protecting personal data in europe. it requires organizations to obtain explicit consent before collecting any personal information from individuals. organizations are also required to inform users about the collection of their personal data and how it is used.

to protect your personal information online, you should be cautious when sharing your personal data with third-party applications or websites. you should only share your personal information with companies that have a strong privacy policy in place. you can also use privacy tools like vpns and ad blockers to protect your data. it is important to keep your software up to date and regularly check your online accounts for suspicious activity. 

overall, you have the power to control how much of your personal information is shared with third-parties. by being mindful of what data you share and taking steps to protect it, you can ensure that your privacy remains intact.</s>
